title: A Seat at The Table and Passing Wisdom Forward
description: NBA Hall of Famer Grant Hill reflects on the influence his parents had on his life, shaping him into the business owner and entrepreneur he is today and the importance of passing that experience along to the next generation of players. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: NBA Hall of Famer Grant Hill reflects on the influence his parents had on his life, shaping him into the business owner and entrepreneur he is today and the importance of passing that experience along to the next generation of players. (Source: Bloomberg)
